infos.value: W-wait, Brother... This is terrifying...
S-Salire, stop clinging to me.
But I'm scared...
Now is not the time.
Brother! You're so heartless sometimes...
Brother...?
I hear voices.
H-ha ha, Brother... Don't play tricks like that.
It's not like there'd be anyone left alive here...
I...I've got a really bad feeling about being here.
Wait... I heard them again.
Just up ahead.
Aren't those...the prison cells?
You can wait here, if you prefer.
There's no way I'd be separated from you...
...Is anyone there?
That voice... Could it be? Lord Adelard!?
Rayches!
Ahh... No wonder I had a bad feeling about being here...
Lord Adelard!
H-hey...
H-hold up! Would you kindly keep your hands off my big brother?
Oh, Salire! You're still alive, too?
Hmph. Brother, you'd be fine if I reduced her to cinders, right?
You're welcome to try, little one. I'll dice you up before you can even say "hocus pocus."
Enough, you two.
I'm amazed you've held out this long.
It was thanks to Tyrrell.
Tyrrell...? The young lad dispatched from Fennes?
It seems that Fennes intended to revolt against Hourne from the off.
Yet Tyrrell was not ready to acquiesce to such treason.
He bid us hide in these cells and then locked us in…
...I see.
Lord Adelard... What of the battlefront? And is Lord Dario safe?
It can't be...
It is. And there is more still. Lady Machérie has been taken captive.
King Robb has formed an alliance with Leonis. As we speak, they are launching an assault on Leonis Castle to rescue her.
Lynx. What did you find?
Not a shadow of a Fennes soldier.
So it was after the retreat...
Then we've no time to waste.
To Leonis!
